documentation.text: @return Number of current period
@notice Set minimum, default & maximum fee rate for all stakers and all policies ('global fee range')

@notice Set the minimum acceptable fee rate (set by staker for their associated worker)
 @dev Input value must fall within `feeRateRange` (global fee range)
@notice Get the minimum acceptable fee rate (set by staker for their associated worker)
@notice Get policy owner
@notice Withdraw fee by node

@notice Withdraw fee by node
 @param _recipient Recipient of the fee

@notice Revoke policy by the sponsor
 @param _policyId Policy id

@notice Refund part of fee by the sponsor
 @param _policyId Policy id

@notice Calculate amount of refund
 @param _policyId Policy id

@notice Get number of arrangements in the policy
 @param _policyId Policy id
@notice Return the information about arrangement
@dev the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`
@dev the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `finishUpgrade`

params._endTimestamp: End timestamp of the policy in seconds
params._policyOwner: Policy owner. Zero address means sender is owner

finishUpgrade(address).details: the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `finishUpgrade`

getArrangementsLength(bytes16).notice: Get number of arrangements in the policy

getMinFeeRate(address).notice: Get the minimum acceptable fee rate (set by staker for their associated worker)

getNodeFeeDelta(address,uint16).notice: Get information about staker's fee rate

ping(address,uint16,uint16,uint16).notice: Call from StakingEscrow to update node info once per period. Set default `feeDelta` value for specified period and update node fee

refund(bytes16).notice: Refund part of fee by the sponsor

refund(bytes16,address).notice: Refund part of one node's fee by the sponsor

revoke(bytes16,address,bytes).notice: Revoke policy or arrangement using owner's signature

params._node: Node that will be excluded, zero address if whole policy will be revoked

setFeeRateRange(uint128,uint128,uint128).notice: Set minimum, default & maximum fee rate for all stakers and all policies ('global fee range')

setMinFeeRate(uint256).details: Input value must fall within `feeRateRange` (global fee range)
setMinFeeRate(uint256).notice: Set the minimum acceptable fee rate (set by staker for their associated worker)

verifyState(address).details: the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`

natspec.notice: Contract holds policy data and locks accrued policy fees
natspec.title: PolicyManager
